methods.entireTable:
Request a full subscription of the data and populate a BarrageTable with the incrementally updating data
 that is received.

:return: (io.deephaven.extensions.barrage.table.BarrageTable) the BarrageTable
methods.partialTable:
Request a partial subscription of the data limited by viewport or column set and populate a BarrageTable
 with the data that is received.

:param viewport: io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet
:param columns: java.util.BitSet
:return: (io.deephaven.extensions.barrage.table.BarrageTable) the BarrageTable

text:
A BarrageSubscription represents a subscription over a table that may or may not be filtered to a viewport of
 the remote source table.
